caption.p: Protective effects of maternal antibodies from immunized mice on neonatal mice against EV71 infection. a A schematic representation of passive immunization and viral infection protocol. The protective effect of the fusion protein vaccine post 200 LD 50 ( b) or 10 LD 50 ( c) of viral infection were evaluated in 1-day-old neonatal mice ( n = 12 ~ 15) born from immunized dams. Survival rates were analyzed via Kaplan–Meier analysis
